1.0.name: wordpress/capsules-by-teleportd
1.0.description:
Capsules is designed to display the content of a capsule created via Teleportd on a WordPress site (you can request a Capsules account at http://teleportd.com).

Features:

  • Display the content of a capsule either by clicking the Capsules button in the editor toolbar and referencing its ID or by inserting the shortcode [capsule]ID[/capsule] (e.g. [capsule]727adf105c9fb7311df7b670747ffd398e18e6d0[/capsule]).
  • [Optional] Set the width and height of the embedded capsule. Default ratio is set to a 500x500 square.
